aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subTitle: Get to know a little bit about me

personalInfo.title: Personal Info
personalInfo.text: My name is Roberto Medina and I am 23 years old. I am a Software Engineer, with a passion for building and creating new software solutions. I have 3 years of experience in Software Engineer, and have had the opportunity to work on a wide range of projects throughout my career.

professionalInfo.title: My Resume
professionalInfo.text: As a software engineer with three years of experience, I continue to be driven by my passion for building and creating. I am constantly seeking out new challenges and pushing myself to develop innovative solutions that can make a real difference in people's lives.

schoolInfo.title: My Education
schoolInfo.parteOne: I have a strong academic background in computer science, having earned my degree from
schoolInfo.parteThree: , one of the top institutions for computer science in my country. During my time at UTA, I gained a deep understanding of the fundamental principles of computer science, including programming, algorithms, data structures, and software design.
